title: PAYDAY.2.v1.12.8.Plus.DLCs-AmULet (August 2014)
description:
This is a full installation of Payday 2. It is updated to version 34 (the newest, as of August, 2014). It is fully patched for play through Tunngle but will also work off-line. Make sure to run the installer with administrative privileges.

BEFORE you play for the first time:

If you wish to change your name, look in your installation folder for a file called "SmartSteamEmu.ini". Scroll down until you find "PersonaName". Change to your hearts content and play the game. If you launch the game without changing your name, you will have no choice but to delete your profile and start again!

Whenever you launch the game, select "LAN / Offline" (online will NOT work). You will still see servers on Crime.net if connected properly to Tunngle.

Enjoy!

Now go rob some banks and steal some jewelry!

- AmULet of ThePirateBay


EXTRAS INCLUDED: Soundtracks (Regular + Christmas), The Guide of Bain

Current Version: 1.12.8 (Update 3
